page.title: 09Christmas
page.content:
EVERY CHRISTMAS MY FAMILY GET TOGETHER FOR CHRISTMAS.I GO TO MY GRANDMA AND GRANDA'S HOUSE FOR MY DINNER.WHEN I GO TO MY GRANDA AND GRANDMA'S I GET MY CHRISTMAS PRESENT.WHAT WE HAVE FOR DINNER IS CHICKEN, POTATOES, PEAS, BRUSSEL SPROUTS, TURNIP, PUDDING AND CUSTARD.MY GRANDA ALWAYS CUTS THE CHICKEN AND HE ALWAYS PUTS RUM ON THE CHRISTMAS PUDDING.THEN HE STIKES A MATCH AND FLAMES APPEAR FROM THE TOP F THE PUDDING.I PULL CHRISTMAS CRACKERS WHICH ARE SHAPED LIKE A TOILET PAPER HOLDER WRAPPED IN PAPER WITH LITTLE GIFTS INSIDE.I GET A LOT OF PRESENTS FOR CHRISTMAS FROM MY FAMILY AND I SOMETIMES GET SOME FROM MY FRIENDS.I GIVE MY FRIENDS PRESENTS BACK FOR THE PRESENTS THEY GAVE ME.
BY LESLEY JACKSON
